fields.description:
h5. Problem description
No code changes are being applied when editing Alloy projects on Android.

This behavior is reproducible both using Appcelerator Studio and from CLI, on both Android Device and emulator.

Attaching log after changing a label in index.xml file.
fields.summary: LiveView: no code changes are being applied in Alloy projects on Android
fields.environment:
LiveView 0.1.14-cr
TiSDK 3.1.1.v20130416154549
Appc-Studio 3.1.0.201304151708
tested on Android Google Nexus One (2.3.6)

comments.body: Verified fixed on Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091728 (containing LiveView 0.1.32).
